name: Kommo-o
flavorText: When it spots enemies, it threatens them by jingling the scales on its tail. Weak opponents will crack and flee in panic.

attacks.name: War Cry
attacks.text: If you have fewer Pokémon in play than your opponent, this attack does 90 more damage.

attacks.name: Clanging Scales
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 30 more damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
